  3. Evan Ture, Single Member District B

Evan Ture, Single Member District B

The Honorable Evan Ture was elected by the Citizens of Buda in November 2017 as Councilmember Place 6.  As part of the Single Member District transition in 2018, Mr. Ture was elected as Councilmember Single Member District B representative, re-elected in November 2020 and sworn-in to office in December 2020.  Mr. Ture was also elected as Mayor Pro Tem by the City Council in 2021 and 2022.
